articles.title: Real Madrid 5-3 Al Hilal: Goals and highlights - FIFA Club World Cup - Marca English
articles.description: What a treat of a game that was, but Real Madrid did what they do in finals - they won. Los Blancos are now Spanish, European and WORLD CHAMPIONS! THE
